text:
[Verse]
Sunshine on my face
Running through the park
Feeling that sweet grace
Lighting up the dark

[Verse 2]
Laughter fills the air
As we dance around
No worries anywhere
Floating off the ground

[Chorus]
Oh the summer breeze
Blowing through the trees
Makes everything feel right
In the golden light

[Verse 3]
Picnics by the shore
Sand between our toes
We'll laugh a little more
As the cool wind blows

[Bridge]
Days that never end
Nights that start to shine
Making memories my friend
Underneath the pine

[Chorus]
Oh the summer breeze
Blowing through the trees
Makes everything feel right
In the golden light
title: Summer Breeze
